thread.title: Ground News - 2023 a good year for PH peace process
thread.title_full: Ground News - 2023 a good year for PH peace process

author: The Manila Times
title: Ground News - 2023 a good year for PH peace process
text:
Summary by The Manila Times THE administration of President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. has achieved much this year in ending the decades-long armed conflict in the country, said Presidential Adviser on the Peace Process Carlito Galvez."Major milestones have been achieved in the comprehensive Philippine peace process under the Marcos administration's Five-Point Peace, Reconciliation and Unity agenda," Galvez said, as he delivered the year-end report of the Office of the President… Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
